name: SirBlinksAlot
description:
This is a offline game with a cute little guy trying to get to the end to see why did nobody go to the end what is it. He wants your help to get to it.

The controls are 

Spacebar to jump

WASD or arrow keys to move

UPDATE: I have fixed the issue of you sticking in walls the name of the zip file is update and now you can enjoy the game without bugs
